content: pattern calls for a size 7 hook and either the famous puritan mercerized crochet cotton article 40 2 balls in white cream or ecru for a doily 15 inches in diameter or the famous puritan star spangled mercerized crochet cotton article 40 4 balls silver spangle or color of choice for a doily 17 inches in diameter any size 10 crochet cotton would be an appropriate substitute
